Monthly contracts listed for the current year and the next 12 calendar years. List monthly contracts for a new calendar year following the termination of trading in the December contract of the current year.
Trading terminates on the 3rd last business day of the month prior to the contract month.

Trading at Settlement (TAS) is subject to the requirements of Rule 524.A. TAS trades off a "Base Price" of zero (equal to the daily settlement price) to create a differential versus the daily settlement price in the underlying futures contract month. The TAS clearing price equals the daily settlement price of the underlying futures contract month plus or minus the TAS transaction price.  TAS Table

Natural Gas meeting the specifications set forth in the FERC-approved tariff of Sabine Pipe Line Company as then in effect at the time of delivery shall be deliverable in satisfaction of futures contract delivery obligations.
